attributes.action: Class seagulls as pests and make their killing legal.
attributes.additional_details: My youngest daughter (2 + 1/2) was recently blinded, in one eye, because of these filthy vermin. She was in much pain and she she still feels extremely uncomfortable going outside at all. I would hate for this to happen to any other parent
attributes.background: I would like to class seagulls as pests as they are violent, disease carrying and noisy. There are too many of them to be endangered however their extreme eating and violent tendencies have cost the lives of many other species.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your daughter's injury.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621690
